name: Pinner
description:
A single drop into Taylor tank canyon, located just past Fatty. Although the rappel was quite beautiful, it's not really worth the effort on the approach and exit. Not much after besides a bushy drainage.

Approach

Descent

We used a fiddle stick/ retrievable anchor off a tree at the head of the watercourse. We don't anticipate future explorations of this watercourse.

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background

Originally explored by Kevin Iosue and Eric Moorcroft. JAN 2024
